name: Korvin Filthfur
damage_resistances: Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning from non-magical attacks that aren't silvered

special_traits.shapechanger: Korvin can transform into a giant rat or hybrid form.
special_traits.sneak_attack: Korvin has advantage on attacks against distracted enemies.
special_traits.summon_rats: Korvin can summon up to 1d6 swarms of rats.

actions.multiattack: Korvin makes two attacks with his shortsword or bites.
actions.shortsword: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Damage: 1d6 + 3 piercing.
actions.bite: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Damage: 2d4 + 3 piercing. Constitution save DC 13 or be cursed with lycanthropy.
actions.ratcatcher_net: Throws a 20x20 ft net that entangles targets in rat webs, giving disadvantage on actions (recharge 5-6).

reactions.slippery_escape: When Korvin takes damage, he can use his reaction to move up to half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

combat_tactics: Korvin uses the environment to his advantage, setting up ambushes and using his net to immobilize enemies.
